description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国高级警官和政治人物。曾任司法部部长、公安部常务副部长等职。后因参加孙力军政治团伙，并涉嫌严重违纪违法被查处，被判处死刑，缓期二年执行。
description.en: A senior police officer and politician of the People's Republic of China. He served as Minister of Justice, Executive Vice Minister of Public Security, and other positions. He was later investigated for participating in Sun Lijun's political clique and serious violations of discipline and law, and was sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve.

description.zh-cn: 傅政华的弟弟。
description.en: Brother of Fu Zhenghua.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国公安部

en: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，傅政华的前任司法部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Fu Zhenghua's predecessor as Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，傅政华的继任司法部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Fu Zhenghua's successor as Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，傅政华担任公安部副部长时的上级。
description.en: Chinese politician, Fu Zhenghua's superior when he was Vice Minister of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，傅政华担任公安部副部长时的上级。
description.en: Chinese politician, Fu Zhenghua's superior when he was Vice Minister of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，傅政华的前任公安部常务副部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Fu Zhenghua's predecessor as Executive Vice Minister of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，傅政华的继任公安部常务副部长和北京市公安局局长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Fu Zhenghua's successor as Executive Vice Minister of Public Security and Director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 中国警官，傅政华的前任北京市公安局局长。
description.en: Chinese police officer, Fu Zhenghua's predecessor as Director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau.

en: Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部原副部长，因严重违纪违法问题被立案审查调查。
description.en: Former Vice Minister of Public Security of the People's Republic of China, investigated for serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 以孙力军为首的政治团伙，被指严重危害政治安全。
description.en: A political clique headed by Sun Lijun, accused of seriously endangering political security.

zh-cn: 吉林省长春市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，国美电器创始人。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, founder of GOME Electrical Appliances.

description.zh-cn: 2004年发生在中国云南大学的一起震惊全国的凶杀案。
description.en: A sensational murder case that occurred at Yunnan University in China in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的一家著名夜总会，后被查封。
description.en: A famous nightclub in Beijing, later shut down.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，后因严重腐败问题被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, later sentenced to life imprisonment for serious corruption.

nodes.id: 2013年中华人民共和国集中打击整治网络违法犯罪专项行动

zh-cn: 2013年中华人民共和国集中打击整治网络违法犯罪专项行动
2013年集中打击整治网络违法犯罪专项行动

description.zh-cn: 2013年中国展开的旨在打击网络谣言和犯罪的专项行动。
description.en: A special campaign launched in China in 2013 to crack down on online rumors and crime.

description.zh-cn: 一个发源于中国的精神修炼及气功法门，后被中国政府取缔。
description.en: A spiritual practice and qigong system originating in China, later banned by the Chinese government.

nodes.id: 中国709维权律师大抓捕事件

zh-cn: 中国709维权律师大抓捕事件

description.zh-cn: 2015年7月起中国公安当局在全国范围内大规模逮捕、传唤、刑事拘留、带走、失联、约谈维权律师、人权捍卫者的事件。
description.en: An incident starting in July 2015 where Chinese public security authorities nationwide arrested, summoned, criminally detained, took away, disappeared, and interviewed human rights lawyers and defenders on a large scale.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国司法部
中华人民共和国公安部

description.zh-cn: 付卫华为傅政华的弟弟。
description.en: Fu Weihua is Fu Zhenghua's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 在担任北京市公安局局长期间，对其弟弟付卫华涉嫌严重犯罪问题线索隐瞒不报，不依法处置，致付卫华长期未被追诉。
description.en: While serving as the director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau, he concealed clues about his brother Fu Weihua's suspected serious crimes and failed to handle them according to law, resulting in Fu Weihua not being prosecuted for a long time.

position.zh-cn: 公安部常务副部长、司法部部长
position.en: Executive Vice Minister of Public Security, Minister of Justice

description.zh-cn: 在李克强担任国务院总理期间，傅政华先后担任公安部常务副部长和司法部部长。
description.en: During Li Keqiang's premiership of the State Council, Fu Zhenghua served successively as Executive Vice Minister of Public Security and Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 在郭声琨担任公安部部长期间，傅政华为其下属。
description.en: When Guo Shengkun was the Minister of Public Security, Fu Zhenghua was his subordinate.

position.en: Executive Vice Minister of Public Security

description.zh-cn: 在赵克志担任公安部部长期间，傅政华为其下属。
description.en: When Zhao Kezhi was the Minister of Public Security, Fu Zhenghua was his subordinate.

description.zh-cn: 接替张军出任中华人民共和国司法部部长。
description.en: Succeeded Zhang Jun as the Minister of Justice of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 司法部部长一职由唐一军接任。
description.en: His position as Minister of Justice was succeeded by Tang Yijun.

description.zh-cn: 其北京市公安局局长及公安部常务副部长职务均由王小洪接任。
description.en: His positions as Director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau and Executive Vice Minister of Public Security were both succeeded by Wang Xiaohong.

description.zh-cn: 2008年结识孙力军，后成为孙力军政治团伙的重要成员，并承认对其唯命是从。
description.en: Met Sun Lijun in 2008, later became an important member of Sun Lijun's political clique, and admitted to being completely subservient to him.

description.zh-cn: 官方通报指其参加孙力军政治团伙，拉帮结派，结党营私。
description.en: Official reports stated that he participated in Sun Lijun's political clique, forming factions and engaging in cronyism.

relationships.source: 中央纪律检查委员会国家监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 因涉嫌严重违纪违法，接受中央纪委国家监委纪律审查和监察调查，并于2022年3月31日被开除党籍和公职。
description.en: Was subjected to disciplinary review and supervisory investigation by the CCDI and NSC for suspected serious violations of discipline and law, and was expelled from the Party and public office on March 31, 2022.

relationships.source: 吉林省长春市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 以受贿罪、徇私枉法罪判处傅政华死刑，缓期二年执行，在其死刑缓期执行二年期满依法减为无期徒刑后，终身监禁，不得减刑、假释。
description.en: Sentenced Fu Zhenghua to death with a two-year reprieve for bribery and bending the law for personal gain. After the two-year reprieve, his sentence will be commuted to life imprisonment without the possibility of parole or commutation.

description.zh-cn: 在担任公安部副部长期间，曾负责调查周永康案。
description.en: While serving as Vice Minister of Public Security, he was responsible for investigating the Zhou Yongkang case.

relationships.target: 2013年中华人民共和国集中打击整治网络违法犯罪专项行动

description.zh-cn: 媒体认为，该专项行动的猛烈开展与傅政华新进兼任公安部副部长有关。
description.en: Media believed that the vigorous implementation of this special campaign was related to Fu Zhenghua's new concurrent appointment as Vice Minister of Public Security.

description.zh-cn: 升任北京市公安局局长后不久，查封了包括“天上人间”在内的四家顶级夜总会。
description.en: Shortly after becoming the Director of the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau, he shut down four top nightclubs, including 'Tian Shang Ren Jian'.

relationships.target: 中国709维权律师大抓捕事件

description.zh-cn: 有媒体指傅政华策划了709维权律师大抓捕事件。
description.en: Some media outlets pointed to Fu Zhenghua as the planner of the 709 crackdown on human rights lawyers.

description.zh-cn: 法轮功团体指控傅政华多次参与取缔法轮功的行动。
description.en: Falun Gong groups accused Fu Zhenghua of participating multiple times in actions to suppress Falun Gong.

description.zh-cn: 曾负责查办黄光裕案。
description.en: Was responsible for investigating the case of Huang Guangyu.

description.zh-cn: 曾负责查办马加爵案。
description.en: Was responsible for investigating the Ma Jiajue case.
